| A blob of preserved organs:* can flow under doors.
* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* wanders randomly.
* [does not move](/wiki/Sessile "Sessile"). |                                                                 |

The **blob of preserved organs** is a monster in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"). Kill the blobs to eliminate their [Hungry Dead](/index.php?title=Hungry_Dead\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Hungry Dead (page does not exist)").
html:
Blob of preserved organs

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
b blob of preserved organs ?
Difficulty 2
Attacks Passive 1d8 physical
b blob of preserved organs ?
Difficulty 2
Attacks

Passive 1d8 physical

Base level 1

Speed 0
Base AC 10
Base MR 0
Alignment −10 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 30
Nutritional value 10
Size Tiny
Resistances Sleep, poison, acid, petrification

A blob of preserved organs:

  • can flow under doors.
  • does not breathe.
  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • wanders randomly.
  • does not move.

The blob of preserved organs is a monster in dNetHack. Kill the blobs to eliminate their Hungry Dead.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Blob_of_preserved_organs&oldid=127822"
